accessibility_text:
## Accessibility

The Noguchi Museum is committed to the accessibility and usability of our websites for all people with disabilities. [The National Center for Accessible Media at WGBH (NCAM)](https://www.wgbh.org/foundation/what-we-do/ncam) serves as accessibility consultant in our active and ongoing efforts toward this end, including continued implementation of the relevant portions of the World Wide Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0 Level AA (WCAG 2.0 AA) as our standard.

If you encounter an access issue, require alternate formats for archival materials, or for any other assistance, please email us at [accessibility@noguchi.org](mailto:accessibility@noguchi.org) or call 718.204.7088 ext 206.

[Learn More About Access](https://www.noguchi.org/museum/education/access/)

## Accessibility

The Noguchi Museum is committed to the accessibility and usability of our websites for all people with disabilities. [The National Center for Accessible Media at WGBH (NCAM)](https://www.wgbh.org/foundation/what-we-do/ncam) serves as accessibility consultant in our active and ongoing efforts toward this end, including continued implementation of the relevant portions of the World Wide Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0 Level AA (WCAG 2.0 AA) as our standard.

If you encounter an access issue, require alternate formats for archival materials, or for any other assistance, please email us at [accessibility@noguchi.org](mailto:accessibility@noguchi.org) or call 718.204.7088 ext 206...
